name: Tap Swipe Shake
description:
Tap Swipe Shake was originally designed for mobile. Some of the features are lacking in this web version. Please download the game for free using the links below.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Use touch and motion gestures in this fast paced addictive arcade game.

Go Solo to try and get a personal best or challenge a friend in multiplayer mode to see who can last the longest!

With 8 different actions:
- Tap
- Swipe
- Shake*
- Tilt*
- Spin
- Double Tap
- Flick
- Pass

*Mobile Only

How long can you survive?
